phrases: Even though it is easy to say I love you
when you stand in front of me
my personality stands up and gets in my way.
I can usually pull through with my assertiveness
that is just how I am.
But no matter how hard I try, I cannot break the wall that is between us.
I want you to realise my feelings.
So I always send a gaze
of I really love you your way
After meeting you, I finally realised
that I am really clumsy when it comes to love.
The scars from love that I would almost forgotten
have started to ache all of a sudden.
Someday, like how I normally would...
I must say I love you, or else I will become even weaker.
On the nights I cannot sleep
Within the vast world, a single seed
and put out a fruit that was still unripe.
The fruit that I wish would turn orange soon
The ideals and dreams just swell -
I wonder if someday the orange
I do not want to know about my future,
I love it, but I feel like crying.
The fruit that I wish would turn orange soon
The ideals and dreams just swell -
Today, I tried eating an orange
but it was so sour I cried.
I could not leave it behind like I have been,
I love it... I love it.
but are not these clothes a bit... you know?
I know they are rentals, but...
It would be a waste if we did not try to have fun on this trip!
I guess I am just a natural skier.
I have not skied since middle school, but I guess I still have it.
You are really a sports genius!
You know, you are pretty good too.
Lean sideways according to the slope.
This is not fun at all.
Sheesh, getting run over by a sled hurts.
Wait, why do you have a sled?
It is not like I wanted to use it...
Could it be that you cannot ski?
What are you so smug about?
I thought I was the only one in our class who could not ski.
I see, so you cannot either.
It is the end of the world, right?
What is so great about wearing two long planks and sliding on snow?
That is what I was wondering too...
Why do not you ask Kitamura to teach you how to ski?
How the hell is he supposed to teach me when I have a sled?
Besides, you are not getting Minorin to teach you.
Sheesh, you are putting all my effort to waste.
The lift is for two, right?
I want to share one with Maruo!
Okay, but should not you share one with Kashii?
Nanako and I want to take pictures of each other while we are on it.
Why is that gal girl acting so friendly with Kitamura?
Did something happen between you and Kitamura?
I just did not tell you about it.
I had tea with Kitamura-kun after I bumped into him on New Year's,
then we went to visit a shrine for a New Year's prayer.
Why did not you tell me about it?
You were in bed with the flu, so you did not need the extra trouble!
And why do I need an excuse anyway?!
I do not have to report every single thing to you!
Hey, why are you so mad?
Why the hell do you always screw things up?!
Why do you always have to get in my way?!
You are the one who is screwing things up.
You play weird tricks so you can hang around Kitamura.
You did, there is no doubt!
It is none of your business!
We just want our friend to be happy!
Wait, what are you talking about?
I am sorry, but I think your tricks are disgusting, and it pisses me off.
I do not give a damn if an idiot like you gets pissed off.
All right, let us be nice to each other.
We are on a field trip, after all.
What is the point of doing it for you?
I do not get you guys.
Yuusaku, are you thickheaded by nature,
or are you doing it on purpose?
If you want to say something, just say it.
Oh my, I cannot believe you are such an airhead.
I cannot believe the first day ended like this.
The field trip will be over before I even talk to her.
Look at them, they look so lethargic.
I am going to use the toilet.
Kitamura did not mention anything about visiting the shrine with Taiga to me.
I honestly do not get what is going on in their minds.
Nope, I saw you leave the dining hall all alone.
Actually, I have been waiting for a chance like this.
Noto-kun and Maya-chan were fighting, right?
I want to relieve the tension between them.
We are on a field trip, after all...
I do not want people to be fighting.
I just thought the exact same thing.
Well, the problem is that Maya-chan wants to be around Kitamura-kun, or something.
That is one view of the problem.
Takasu-kun, do you know why Noto-kun wants to stop Maya-chan's love?
It is because he misunderstood and thinks that Taiga likes Kitamura-kun,
and he wants to help Taiga, so...
It is not really a misunderstanding.
I am sure there are things about Taiga that you do not know.
There is nothing I do not know.
She said it is a treasure, so I am going to really cherish it.
Oh, I am talking about the hair clip, not myself.
It is no use no matter how hard I try...
This is what they call reality.
Regardless of what happened on Christmas Eve, or of my one-sided feelings,
she pretends that it never happened.
We are worried about you, Takasu!
Wait, Kitamura, what are you doing?!
Why are you taking your clothes off all of a sudden?
You are only undressing your bottom part!
That is not all, you are waving it on top of Takasu's face...
There is some mysterious gas in my butt...
B-By Kushieda, you mean that Kushieda?
That is right, it is Kushieda Minori!
I have been in love with that weird girl for over a year!
But I was rejected on Christmas Eve before I could...
But why did Kushieda reject you?
If I were a girl, I would definitely go out with Taka-chan!
No, going out with you would be bad.
Yeah, it is like what happened in Chushingura.
You are Asano Takumi-no-kami, and we are the Akou Ronin.
I am sure Kitamura is using me as an excuse to take revenge on the girls.
Also, why is it so messy?
I found a navy blue camisole!
I never knew you had a...
It is not what you think.
I cannot tolerate an odd number of socks, so I am pairing them up to make them even.
How could she wipe the tatami with that?
Hey, do not wipe your hair with that!
As I thought, no one's here.
I am begging you, do not talk!
This is the only time I have ever begged you!
Nanako, you love taking baths, do not you?
By the way, Ami-chan, your curves are great!
I never wanted to be an actress.
She came back to the room first, right?
Do not tell me Taiga went to the guys' room by herself.
She might be together with Maruo and...
No way, you are overthinking it.
Would not it be possible for Yuusaku to walk in on her and Takasu-kun doing stuff?
If that were real, I would totally hate it!
Besides, I wonder what is going on in Taiga's mind.
Is she really interested in Maruo?
Between Takasu-kun and Maruo, which one do you think is Taiga's favourite?
Well, it would be troublesome for me to answer.
Just ask Taiga herself when she comes back.
Kushieda, you have been pretty quiet since we got back.
Maybe I am tired from skiing.
I have been sleepy since we got back.
Do not count on getting any sleep tonight.
We are going to have a girl talk.
I wonder if Takasu-kun could get Taiga.
That would make all these problems disappear.
And so, Minori-chan was dragged into her sea of thought.
This is relevant to my interests!
I said something I should not have because you were spacing out.
Come on, do not just stare at each other.
Hurry up and tell us, Ami-chan!
Now that Maya-chan has said that, what should I do, Minori-chan?
How you rejected Takasu-kun before he could confess on Christmas Eve.
Wait, Ami-chan, how do you know about it?
Amin, why did you bring that up?
Because you are always spacing out.
I am just saying it to spite you because it seems you do not really care.
Takasu-kun is interested in you, not Taiga,
I think you are just pretending to be an airhead so you can just forget about it.
You are probably thinking Let us just be friends forever.
When did you see me pretending that nothing has happened?
What do you know about me?
Can you look into my heart?
Besides, this has nothing to do with you.
I see, so it has nothing to do with me...
So your sense of guilt is nothing too, right?
I thought you at least had some feelings for Takasu-kun.
I thought you rejected him because you thought you would feel guilty about someone.
You rejected him simply because you do not like him.
I will tell him about it tomorrow, then.
Do not you think it would be kinder to just end it now,
I said, do what you want!
You are really good at faking.
Ami-chan, what is wrong with you?
Why are we all arguing on a field trip?
Yeah, you went a bit overboard.
Just apologise, and let it be.
All right, now it is over.
I have already forgotten about it.
Oh yeah, Taiga is not back yet.
L-Let us look for her together!
I think we just witnessed something that we should not have.
Yeah, and Kushieda was a bit...
Am I the only one who does not get what they were arguing about?
Which country was Ami-chan talking about?
Hey, Taka-chan, what is going on?
Anyway, we neither saw nor heard anything.
I am tired, so I am taking a break.
There is something I have to apologise for.
It might be my fault that Minori-chan rejected you.
I said something sarcastic to Minori-chan when you were not around.
I do not even know why I said it.
You know, I had an argument with Minori-chan yesterday.
I just felt pissed off whenever I saw her face...
No matter how hard I pushed her, I could not find out how she really feels.
I hate you because you are an idiot.
I hate myself because I am an idiot too.
I felt really guilty, and I exploded.
There were a lot of misunderstandings, and now it is like this...
Seriously, I told you to move.
How many times are you going to do that?!
I will buy you some ice cream when we get back to the dorm!
Amin, I am sorry for not stopping.
You did it on purpose, right?
There is no doubt that you did it on purpose.
You still have not forgotten about what happened yesterday, right?
You came to mess things up because I was having a chat with Takasu-kun, right?
By what happened yesterday, you mean the thing you started?
Just when I forgot about it you went and brought it up again.
What do you mean you forgot about it?
You have been ignoring me all morning.
Your egotistical gaze pisses me off, you brainless Hercules.
You are just pissed off because you are jealous!
I thought you did not want to be an actress!
I have always hated people like you!
Hey, this does not look good.
Oh, a follow-up on yesterday's argument?
Do not just stand there and watch, come with me!
What the heck is going on?
Both of you, cut it out!
What is wrong with you two?
All of the ski resort's staff are out looking for her.
If they cannot find her, they are going to call the police.
Get a grip on yourself, they will definitely find her!
I am going to look for her.
This time, it might be you who will -
But I cannot just stay here!
I will come back when I have checked the places we have been to.
I will go with you guys.
Ami, tell the teacher we are going out to look for her.
There are some skid marks down here.
Hurry and get some adults over here.
She has always been by my side, but I never noticed.
I will never let go of you when I catch you this time!
Ryuuji would definitely save me at a time like this.
The God of Broken Hearts' blessing did not work.
My wish did not come true.
Please take these feelings away from me...
I am no good right now...
I am afraid that is not true, sorry.
